about.en: Bachelor student at the Hasso Plattner Institute in Potsdam. Interested in computer graphics, human-computer interaction, video game development and music composition.
about.de: Bachelorstudent am Hasso-Plattner-Institut in Potsdam. Interessiert an Computergrafik, Mensch-Computer-Interaktion, Videospielentwicklung und Musikkomposition.
